ygData.subject: Mystic Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! I am Fentus Fayspark, guildleader of the Mystic Alliance on Rodcet Nife. The Mystic Alliance was created many months ago to create a place
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone!

I am Fentus Fayspark, guildleader of the Mystic Alliance on Rodcet Nife.
The Mystic Alliance was created many months ago to create a place where GLBT
poeple and our straight allies could be wihout fear of harassment or
discrimination in the world of Norrath. A temporary website was created for
the guild (http://members.tripod.com/kerik), and we are in the process of
creating a new one. I belive the Mystic Alliance is active on other
servers also, but I only have experience with Rodcet nife. So here is an
official invitation to eveyrone on the list to join the Mystic Alliance on
Rodcet Nife! Feel free to contact Genesius, Fentus, Damarr, Taren,
Ssauric, Siza, or Vesuka to be invited into the guild, be sure to mention
you are part of this list to be immediatly invited.

-joe

----- Original Message -----
From: "Mike Buck" <Lugh@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 11:57 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Guilds


> Well I remember a conversation this list had a bit ago about guild, (if Im
remembering correctly). But alas I cant seem to find the messages =(. Anyway
me and my bf would gladly switch to a server with a gay guild, or one just
with gays in it =) We're having a hard time finding a good guild on our
server. Anyway if you are on a server with one send a message!
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
